entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
